level.text: 2931.1 At the time of filing an application with the Zoning Commission, thepplicant shall pay the filing fee specified in ยง 3180.1(b)(16), plus such feess apply to any additional zoning relief requested. The provisions of ยง 3181elating to the administration of fees shall apply, except that the applicantay appeal any decision of the Director regarding the fee schedule to the Zoningommission, which shall decide the appeal as a preliminary matter to hearing thepplication.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 58 DCR 4788, 4811 (June 3,011).
